RuleDetails.Rules:
Admin Fee IRR 750,000 Apply For Refund / Change Per Ticket
Refund: After 2 Working Days

FLYDUBAI EXCURSION FARES FROM IRAN TO AREA 02.
 APPLICATION
   AREA
     THESE FARES APPLY
     FROM IRAN,ISLAMIC REPUBLIC OF TO AREA 2.
   CLASS OF SERVICE
     THESE FARES APPLY FOR BUSINESS/ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE.
   TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION
     THIS RULE GOVERNS ONE-WAY AND ROUND-TRIP FARES.
     FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE
     ONE-WAY/ROUND-TRIP/CIRCLE-TRIP/SINGLE OPEN-JAW/DOUBLE
     OPEN-JAW JOURNEYS.
     THESE FARES MAY NOT BE USED FOR INDIVIDUAL AND GROUP
     INCLUSIVE TOURS.
 CAPACITY LIMITATIONS
   THE CARRIER SHALL LIMIT THE NUMBER OF PASSENGERS CARRIED
   ON ANY ONE FLIGHT AT FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE AND SUCH
   FARES WILL NOT NECESSARILY BE AVAILABLE ON ALL FLIGHTS.
   THE NUMBER OF SEATS WHICH THE CARRIER SHALL MAKE
   AVAILABLE ON A GIVEN FLIGHT WILL BE DETERMINED BY THE
   CARRIERS BEST JUDGMENT
 OTHER CONDITIONS
   ALL FARES ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE OR WITHDRAWAL
   WITHOUT NOTICE.
   -----
   FARES ARE ONLY GUARANTEED IF AUTO-PRICED AND
   TICKETED IN GDS ON THE SAME DAY.
   -----
   TICKET DEADLINE CONTROL
   THE FARE QUOTE GENERATES A LAST TICKETING DATE
   WHICH MAY DIFFER FROM THE TICKETING DEADLINE
   CONTROL DATE MENTIONED IN THE PNR. THE MOST
   RESTRICTIVE DATE APPLIES.
   -----
   UNACCOMPANIED CHILD IS NOT PERMITTED ON FZ
   -----
   THIS FARE MAY ONLY BE USED TO CREATE BOOKINGS FOR
   PASSENGERS UP TO 9.PLEASE CONTACT GROUP DESK FOR
   BOOKINGS MORE THAN 9 PASSENGERS ELSE THEY WILL BE
   SUBJECT TO CANCELLATION.

TRAVEL FROM LAST INTERNATIONAL STOPOVER MUST COMMENCE NO
  LATER THAN 12 MONTHS AFTER DEPARTURE FROM FARE ORIGIN.

TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON/BEFORE 31DEC 16.
 
  TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON FZ  AND MAY ONLY BE SOLD IN
  UNITED ARAB EMIRATES/SAUDI ARABIA/QATAR/BAHRAIN/OMAN/
  KUWAIT/RUSSIA/PAKISTAN/ROMANIA/TURKEY/MACEDONIA,THE FORMER
  YUGOSLAV REPUBLIC OF/UKRAINE/SERBIA/MONTENEGRO/LEBANON/
  JORDAN/CROATIA/INDIA/SLOVENIA/BOSNIA AND HERZEGOVINA/
  YEMEN, REPUBLIC OF/KAZAKHSTAN/UNITED KINGDOM/CZECH
  REPUBLIC/AUSTRIA/SLOVAKIA/BULGARIA/TANZANIA,UNITED
  REPUBLIC OF/UGANDA/KYRGYZSTAN
  OR - TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON FZ  AND MAY ONLY BE SOLD IN
       KENYA/AZERBAIJAN/RWANDA/SRI LANKA/IRAN,ISLAMIC
       REPUBLIC OF
  OR - TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON FZ  OR HR AND MAY NOT BE
       SOLD IN UNITED ARAB EMIRATES/QATAR/BAHRAIN/OMAN/SAUDI
       ARABIA/KUWAIT/CROATIA/MACEDONIA,THE FORMER YUGOSLAV
       REPUBLIC OF/SERBIA/MONTENEGRO/LEBANON/BOSNIA AND
       HERZEGOVINA/UNITED KINGDOM/CZECH REPUBLIC/AUSTRIA/
       SLOVAKIA/BULGARIA/KYRGYZSTAN/AZERBAIJAN

VALID FOR TRAVEL COMMENCING ON/BEFORE 31DEC 16. ALL TRAVEL
  MUST BE COMPLETED BY MIDNIGHT ON 31DEC 16.

RESERVATIONS FOR ALL SECTORS AND TICKETING ARE REQUIRED AT
  LEAST 2 HOURS BEFORE DEPARTURE.
         NOTE -
          WHEN RESERVATIONS ARE MADE AT LEAST 48 HOURS
          BEFORE DEPARTURE TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED
          WITHIN 24 HOURS AFTER RESERVATIONS ARE MADE OR
          AT LEAST 48 HOURS BEFORE DEPARTURE WHICHEVER IS
          EARLIER.
          -----
          WHEN RESERVATIONS ARE MADE WITHIN 48 HOURS TO
          DEPARTURE TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED AT THE SAME
          TIME.
          -----
          IF A TICKET IS USED OUT OF SEQUENCE FZ RESERVES
          THE RIGHT TO CANCEL ANY PNR OR INVALIDATE THE
          REMAINING FLIGHT COUPONS.
          -----
          IF A PASSENGER FAILS TO TRAVEL ON A SECTOR BOOKED
          FZ RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CANCEL THE REMAINING FZ
          SECTORS.

THE FARE COMPONENT MUST BE ON
      ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
        ANY FZ FLIGHT OPERATED BY FZ.

ACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-11 - CHARGE 100 PERCENT OF THE FARE.
        TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS CH.
    MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN SAME COMPARTMENT
      BY ADULT 16 OR OLDER
  OR - 1ST INFANT UNDER 2 WITHOUT A SEAT - CHARGE 20 PERCENT
         OF THE FARE.
             TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS IN.
         MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN SAME
           COMPARTMENT BY ADULT 16 OR OLDER.
         NOTE -
          WHEN INFANT REACHES 2 YEARS OF AGE ON/BEFORE
          DEPARTURE FROM POINT OF TURNAROUND A SEAT
          MUST BE BOOKED ON THE RETURN LEG AND A SEPARATE
          TICKET MUST BE ISSUED AT THE APPLICABLE CHILD
          FARE.
  OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITH A SEAT - CHARGE 100 PERCENT OF
         THE FARE.
             TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS CH.
         MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN SAME
           COMPARTMENT BY ADULT 16 OR OLDER.

UNLIMITED FREE STOPOVERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT.
         NOTE -
          STOPOVERS ARE PERMITTED ONLY AT THE CITIES
          MENTIONED IN THE ROUTING ATTACHED.

UNLIMITED FREE TRANSFERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT
    FARE BREAK AND EMBEDDED SURFACE SECTORS NOT PERMITTED ON
     THE FARE COMPONENT.
         NOTE -
          UNLIMITED TRANSFERS PERMITTED AS PER THE ATTACHED
          ROUTE MAP.

FOR URTBGIR1 TYPE FARES
 
  THE PROVISIONS BELOW APPLY ONLY AS FOLLOWS -
  TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON FZ .
    THERE IS NO CHARGE FOR TRAVEL PER TICKET.
 
  OTHERWISE
    A SURCHARGE OF 8 PERCENT OF THE FARE PER TICKET WILL BE
    ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL. APPLIES PER
    ADULT. CHILD/INFANT DISCOUNTS APPLY.

THE ORIGINAL AND THE REISSUED TICKET MUST BE ANNOTATED -
  NON-END/VLD ON FZ ONLY - AND - NO CHNGS/RFND WITHIN 24HRS-
  AND - CTC TA FOR CHNGS - IN THE ENDORSEMENT BOX.

CHANGES
 
    ANY TIME
      CHANGES PERMITTED FOR REISSUE.
         NOTE -
          FLIGHT/DATE CHANGE PERMITTED FREE OF CHARGE.
          FARE FOR THE MODIFIED ITINERARY MUST BE EQUAL OR
          HIGHER THAN THE FARE ORIGINALLY PAID. ANY FARE/TAX
          DIFFERENCE NEED TO BE COLLECTED.
          -----
          REVALIDATION NOT PERMITTED.
          -----
          CHANGES ARE NOT PERMITTED WITHIN 24 HOURS TO THE
          SCHEDULED FLIGHT DEPARTURE.
          -----
          ANYTIME PASSENGER NEED TO CONTACT THE ORIGINAL
          TICKET ISSUED AGENT FOR ANY MODIFICATION.
          -----
          PASSENGER WHO NOSHOW THE FLIGHT WILL NOT BE
          ALLOWED TO MODIFY THE TICKET AND FOREFIET THE
          TOTAL AMOUNT FOR THAT FARE COMPONENT.
          -----
          IN THE EVENT OF A COMBINATION OF FARES THE MOST
          RESTRICTIVE FARE CONDITION APPLIES.
          -----
          INCASE OF SCHEDULED FLIGHT TIME CHANGE OF MORE
          THAN 3 HOURS AGENT CAN REISSUE / REFUND THE
          TICKET FREE OF COST.
 
  CANCELLATIONS
 
    ANY TIME
      PER DIRECTION CHARGE USD 100.00 FOR CANCEL/REFUND.
         NOTE -
          CANCELLATIONS ARE NOT PERMITTED WITHIN 24 HOURS
          TO THE SCHEDULED FLIGHT DEPARTURE
          -----
          PASSENGER NEED TO CONTACT THE ORIGINAL TICKET
          ISSUED AGENT FOR ANY CANCELLATION/REFUND.
          -----
          PASSENGER WHO NOSHOW THE FLIGHT WILL NOT BE
          ALLOWED CANCEL/REFUND THE TICKET AND FOREFIET THE
          TOTAL AMOUNT FOR THAT FARE COMPONENT.
          -----
          YR IS NON-REFUNDABLE IN CASE OF VOLUNTARY
          CANCELLATION.
          -----
          FOR PARTLY UTILIZED TICKETS- DEDUCT 75 PERCENT OF
          THE TICKETED FARE PLUS THE ABOVE PENALTY CHARGES.
          -----
          IN THE EVENT OF A COMBINATION OF FARES THE MOST
          RESTRICTIVE FARE CONDITION APPLIES.
          -----
          IF A TICKET IS USED OUT OF SEQUENCE FZ RESERVES
          THE RIGHT TO CANCEL ANY PNR OR INVALIDATE THE
          REMAINING FLIGHT COUPONS.
          -----
          IF YOUR FLIGHT IS CANCELLED YOU MAY BE REBOOKED ON
          THE NEXT AVAILABLE FLIGHT TO THE SAME DESTINATION
          FREE OF CHARGE.YOU CAN ALSO CHANGE YOUR RETURN
          JOURNEY FREE OF CHARGE SUBJECT TO AVAILABILITY.
          ALTERNATIVELY YOU CAN CANCEL YOUR RESERVATION AND
          RECEIVE A FULL REFUND.IN CASE OF PARTLY UTILISED
          TICKETS FARE AND TAXES OF USED PORTION WILL BE
          DEDUCTED AND BALANCE WILL BE REFUNDED.
          ----
          REFUND WILL ONLY BE GIVEN FOR TICKETS WITHIN
          1YEAR FROM DATE OF ORIGINAL ISSUE.

BETWEEN IRAN,ISLAMIC REPUBLIC OF AND DXB
   END-ON-END NOT PERMITTED. SIDE TRIPS PERMITTED.
   APPLICABLE ADD-ON CONSTRUCTION IS ADDRESSED IN
   MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS - CATEGORY 23.
  OPEN JAWS
    FARES MAY BE COMBINED ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS WITH FZ
    FARES
    -TO FORM SINGLE OR DOUBLE OPEN JAWS.
   PROVIDED -
     COMBINATIONS ARE WITH ANY -IR1 TYPE FARES IN ANY RULE
     AND TARIFF.
  ROUND TRIPS/CIRCLE TRIPS
    FARES MAY BE COMBINED ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS WITH FZ
    FARES
    -TO FORM ROUND TRIPS
    -TO FORM CIRCLE TRIPS
     A MAXIMUM OF TWO INTERNATIONAL FARE COMPONENTS
     PERMITTED.
   PROVIDED -
     COMBINATIONS ARE WITH ANY -IR1 TYPE FARES IN ANY RULE
     AND TARIFF.

NOTE -
          HIGHER INTERMEDIATE POINTS/DIRECTIONAL MINIMUM
          CHECKS AND MILEAGE SURCHARGES MAY BE IGNORED.
